author: /cronologia/-/meta/redaccion
title: Fuertes lluvias dejan inundaciones en el país
text: TEGUCIGALPA, HONDURAS.- Calles cerradas por inundaciones y carros varados son el resultado ocasionado por las fuertes lluvias registradas durante la noche de este jueves en la capital de Honduras. En horas de la noche, el ingreso de frente frío vino acompañado de lluvias torrenciales, dejando a su paso varios estragados en diferentes puntos de la capital. En un video que circula en redes sociales, se logra ver un conductor empujando su vehículo varado debido a las inundaciones el bulevar Fuerzas Armadas a la altura de un centro comercial de Tegucigalpa. Asimismo, se reportaron varias zonas intransitables, entre ellas el bulevar La Hacienda, al oriente del Distrito Central, donde el agua llegó hasta el nivel completo de las llantas de los automóviles. El ingreso de este frente frio generó condiciones climáticas con abundante nubosidad variada, lluvias y chubascos moderados a fuertes, provocando estas incidencias. Continúan las lluvias en algunas zonas del país El pronosticador del [Comité Permanente de Contingencias (Copeco)](https://x.com/CopecoHonduras1/status/1740679049205424379?s=20), Walter Aguilar, indicó que se generarán condiciones de abundante nubosidad, lluvias y chubascos de moderados a fuertes. Estas lluvias estarán acompañados de actividad eléctrica en el norte, con un descenso gradual de las temperaturas, vientos racheados y fríos del norte y noroeste. Las zonas más afectadas serán en la zona norte del país, donde el agua superará los 100 a 150 (mm) de agua, especialmente en los departamentos de Cortes, Atlántida, Islas de la Bahía, Yoro, Colón y Gracias a Dios. Si las lluvias continúan en las próximas horas con posibles inundaciones y deslizamientos de tierra, estas podrían extenderse hasta fin de año y comienzo de Año Nuevo. Emiten alerta verde en algunos departamentos Tras el ingreso de frente frio al país, Copeco emitió una alerta verde en siete departamentos del país, a partir del medio día de este jueves con un período de 72 horas. Los departamentos declarados en alerta son: Islas de la Bahía, Santa Bárbara, Yoro, Atlántida, Cortés, Colón y Gracias a Dios. En ese sentido, ante las inundaciones urbanas que dejan la vaguada prefrontal y el frente frío en varias ciudades del país, Copeco pide a los conductores de vehículos no circular en sectores anegados por las lluvias para no exponerse a estos riesgos. Este artículo se firma bajo el anonimato para proteger a sus autores

author: @rtlinfo
title: Des centaines de manifestants à Tel Aviv en soutien aux otages | RTL Info
text: Partager: Des centaines de proches des otages israéliens ont manifesté jeudi pour demander aux responsables politiques réunis à Doha au Qatar de trouver rapidement une issue au conflit entre le Hamas et Israël. Les participants au cortège dans la ville côtière se sont adressés aux négociateurs israéliens: "ne rentrez pas sans un accord", selon des médias locaux. Après des mois de pourparlers infructueux, de nouvelles discussions se tiennent, à l'appel des médiateurs -Qatar, Etats-Unis et Egypte- pour tenter d'obtenir un cessez-le-feu dans cette guerre, déclenchée par une attaque du mouvement islamiste palestinien Hamas contre Israël le 7 octobre. Le directeur de la CIA William Burns et les chefs des services de renseignement extérieur (Mossad) et intérieur (Shin Beth) israéliens y ont pris part. Le Hamas n'y a pas participé. Mais l'organisation palestinienne se tient continuellement informée du contenu des discussions, ont appris à bonne source l'AFP et DPA. Les pourparlers de Doha se basent sur un plan annoncé le 31 mai par Joe Biden qui prévoit dans une première phase une trêve de six semaines accompagnée d'un retrait israélien des zones densément peuplées de Gaza, et de la libération d'otages israéliens -emmenés à Gaza lors de l'attaque du 7 octobre- contre des prisonniers palestiniens. Sur 251 personnes enlevées ce jour-là, 111 sont toujours retenues à Gaza, dont 39 déclarées mortes par l'armée.

author: 网易
title: 2025世界人工智能大会举办，华为云AI CITY五大案例谱绘城市发展新未来_网易科技
text:
（原标题：2025世界人工智能大会举办，华为云AI CITY五大案例谱绘城市发展新未来）
7月26日-28日，以“智能时代 同球共济”为主题的第七届世界 人工智能 大会（WAIC）拉开帷幕。活动共吸引800余家企业参展，3000余项前沿展品集中亮相，规模创历届之最。会上，华为云携花都、东莞、贵安、宝安、无锡五大城市标杆案例，展现了AI CITY理念赋能城市现代化治理与产业升级的最新成果，以落地实效不断牵引智慧城市建设迈向新高度。
华为云AI CITY理念，城市智能跃迁的时代答案
一直以来，华为云积极为城市建设符合发展需要、匹配产业特色的新型数字基础设施，构建场景化解决方案。为了推动智慧城市演进，华为云“一城一云一模型”逐步向“AI CITY”升级，以人工智能技术为核心驱动，统筹推进算力基础设施建设，统一构建共性能力平台，深化数据、知识、人才等要素供给，推动科技创新与城市现代化、产业现代化的深度融合，实现城市综合实力整体性、系统性跃升。
华为云AI CITY以“模型+知识”双轮驱动，采用了1234MNX架构，即1个分布式智能云底座，AI安全和AI运维构成的2个保障体系，AI模型平台、AI数据平台、AI原生应用平台组成的3套AI工程平台，M个数据资产、N个模型资产，涵盖算力及云服务运营、模型运营、数据运营、应用创新及生态运营的4类运营，以及泛政府、工业制造、矿山、气象、文旅、医疗医药等X个应用创新，不断释放AI先进生产力赋能城市现代化。
如今，华为云 AI CITY落地实践已经在花都、东莞、贵安、宝安、无锡等城市及地区结出累累硕果，以系统化创新加速城市智能跃迁。
赋能产业集群提质增效，花都铺设数智转型“快车道”
广州市花都区联合华为云等打造新型工业化数字服务平台，以“1+1+4”全产业链互联网架构，服务汽车零件、电子信息、美妆日护等产业集群。目前，平台已落地超9个AI场景模型应用，涉及超20家企业和万级C端客户，大大降低了企业数字化门槛。
依托花都区新型工业化数字服务平台，芬豪香精公司构建“AI寻香助手”，将香料分析环节工作量从数天降低至数分钟，产品研发周期从数月缩短到数天；在皮具箱包领域，平台为企业提供AI辅助设计解决方案和柔性智造解决方案，设计和出格效率提升50%。
加速制造产业智能化，东莞打造“智”造名城
东莞市人工智能大模型中心依托华为坚实的软硬件基础底座，基于制造企业共性需求，为企业提供充足AI算力、AI开发平台和大模型算法服务，支持企业以少量数据和低成本提高模型精度。目前，该中心已和10余家企业合作，在大模型构建、AI智能客服、AI智能质检等三大领域率先完成验证性测试。
在生物医药领域，大模型中心助力东阳光构建了完整的药物分子筛选与优化体系，提高药物研发的效率和成功率；在工业制造领域，旺盈集团通过引入AI视觉检测技术，产线检测准确率提升至99%，漏检率降低至0.5%以下。
让安全与能效双提升，贵安打造“人工智能训练场”
贵安新区依托华为云盘古大模型，构建“政务大模型+矿山大模型”双模型驱动的智能底座，聚焦煤矿、电力等8大行业，政务、文旅等4大领域，助力传统产业焕发“新”机。
在能源矿山领域，项目孵化全国首个瓦斯浓度预测大模型，实现瓦斯浓度变化提前5分钟预测、准确率达90%。在城市安全领域，贵安打造了业界首个森林防火感知大模型，实现100+安全事件一图多识，快速、全面感知森林防火运行态势，提升城市安全运行能力。
“产学研造”深度协同，宝安构建具身智能新引擎
在深圳宝安，华为云携手政府以“产学研造”协同模式，构建“3+3+1”全栈具身智能核心引擎，突破具身智能5大关键技术领域瓶颈，成为宝安人工智能产业发展的新质引擎。目前，中心已吸引9家企业进驻，多个联合创新项目在垂类场景中率先落地。
在柔性自动化装配场景中，精密力控插装算法已实现部署，典型任务如LOGO贴装的成功率已提升至95%；此外，首批联合创新项目已覆盖工业焊接、螺钉装配、油田巡检等垂直领域，电力行业巡检作业场景的机器人已进入现场测试阶段。
推动科技与产业创新融合，无锡激活新型工业化新动能
无锡人工智能创新中心依托华为云AI能力和无锡数据集团核心运营服务，打造集技术研发、产业赋能、生态培育为一体的服务平台，重点布局柔性装配、柔性码垛、柔性质检三大核心应用场景。中心通过整合算力资源、行业数据集、基础大模型及AI专业服务，有效降低企业技术创新门槛。创新中心采用"联合攻关+示范应用"双驱动模式，加速AI技术突破与工业化场景的深度融合，为新型工业化注入强劲动能。
一直以来，华为坚持践行城市数字化合伙人战略，在全国160多个城市建立城市云运营中心，开放自身技术、品牌与生态，提供全周期、属地化的运营和运维服务。“城市是AI系统性跃升的核心载体”，华为云未来将持续深耕“黑土地”角色，为城市产业提供安全、绿色、普惠的云底座，推动智慧城市建设向新向好。
本文来源：大众新闻 责任编辑： 潘双婷_ND2358
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology

author: ArcaMax Publishing, Inc.
title: That's hot: Needles dethrones Phoenix as hottest US city in July | Weather News | ArcaMax Publishing
text:
LOS ANGELES — A town of 5,200 just inside the California border along Route 66 now boasts a scorching new record — the hottest monthly average temperature in the country.
Needles averaged 103.2 degrees in July, surpassing Phoenix's highest average temperature last July of 102.7 degrees, according to the Arizona State Climate Office. In an X post, the department ceded the unfortunate title to Needles.
The post also referenced two other cities, Palm Springs and Blythe, and welcomed them to the club of cities with average temperatures of at least three digits for an entire month.
"Welcome?" the post said.
Jan Jernigan, the mayor of Needles, was not surprised by her town's achievement, saying: "We probably did (beat the record), quite easily."
The heat is a part of the town's culture. When the City Council hosts meetings, it offers guests a basket of Red Hots candy with a sign that reads, "Needles is Red Hot," Jernigan said.
Needles has learned to hold city events early in the morning to avoid the worst of the heat, Jernigan said. A food distribution event Thursday morning started around 5 a.m. and lasted only until 8 a.m., she said, before temperatures became oppressive.
 The town, also known for references in the "Peanuts" comics as the home of Snoopy's brother Spike, still draws tourists and residents alike to its three beaches on the Colorado River where they can try to beat the summer heat, said City Manager Patrick Martinez. The city has spent $8.4 million in grants to improve infrastructure, including updating parks, he said.
"You've (got to) be waist-deep in the Colorado River" to stay cool in Needles, he said.
In late June, the region's intense heat was partly to blame for an unusual brush fire that broke out near Needles, burning 70 acres and destroying one structure. It crossed into Arizona and burned 143 acres there. Martinez said the infrastructure upgrades included beach cleanups that will help reduce the risk of future wildfires, especially during a wildfire-prone summer. This year's hot weather has contributed to fires burning 30 times as many acres statewide as last year.
To fight the heat, the town operates a senior center that provides water and a cool place for people to gather. It is equipped with a generator and can be opened during an emergency if power outages put residents in danger of overheating, Martinez said.
Jernigan said the most recent improvements to Needles' infrastructure aren't the end of the story. "We still have a long way to go," she said.

author: absoluteradio
title: Steel unions call on Government to secure future of Scunthorpe steel
text:
Steel unions call on government to secure future of Scunthorpe Steel
The Chinese owners of British Steel are launching a consultation on closing the blast furnaces in Scunthorpe
Last updated 2 hours ago
Unions are calling on the government to secure the future of steelmaking in Northern Lincolnshire, following the news that British Steel's owner is launching a fresh consultation on closing Scunthorpe's blast furnaces.
Jingye, who operate British Steel, will launch their consultation in June, or at a later date, should an agreement with the UK government be reached.
Scunthorpe steelworks is the UK's last remaining primary steelmaking facility, and employs thousands of people directly and through extensive supply chains throughout the UK.
A statement on behalf of Jingye says since 2020, they have invested more than £1.2 bn to maintain operations at British Steel, amid ongoing production instability and significant financial losses of around £700k a day.
Investments to date include over £300m in strategic capital projects such as a state-of-the-art mast service centre in Skinningrove, a rail stocking facility and a new billet caster.
Despite this, the blast furnaces and steelmaking operations are no longer financially sustainable due to highly challenging market conditions, the imposition of tariffs, and higher environmental costs relating to the production of high-carbon steel.
Steel unions Community, GMB and Unite are coming together to call on the government for support.
Community General Secretary Roy Rickhuss CBE said:
"This is a dark day for our steel industry and for our country. We urge Jingye and the UK Government to get back around the table to resume negotiations before it is too late."
"Cruciallly, Jingye have not ruled out retaining the blast furnaces during a transition to low carbon steelmaking if they can secure the backing of the Government."
"If the government chooses to let Scunthorpe die it would make a mockery of their grand ambitions to deliver growth through massive infrastructure investment, because British Steel is our only steelmaker than can produce the construction steels the country needs for our roads, railways, schools and hospitals."
Linda McCulloch, National Officer for Unite the Union, said:
"This is devastating news and there is now a duty on the Government to do everything it can to prevent a catastrophic outcome. As the last primary steelmaking facility in the UK, Scunthorpe is a vital strategic asset which we cannot afford to lose."
Charlotte Brumpton-Childs, GMB National Officer, said:
“This is devastating news for the people of Scunthorpe and the whole of UK steelmaking.
“But it’s not too late: we urge Jingye and the government to do everything in their power to save this vital domestic industry.”
"Deeply worrying time"
In response, Jonathan Reynolds, the Business and Trade Secretary said “I know this will be a deeply worrying time for staff and, while this is British Steel’s decision, we will continue working tirelessly to reach an agreement with the company’s owners to secure its future and protect taxpayers’ money.
“We’ve been clear there’s a bright future for steelmaking in the UK. We’ve committed up to £2.5 billion to rebuild the sector and will soon publish a Plan for Steel setting out how we can achieve a sustainable future for the workforce, industry and local communities.”
Hear the latest news from across the UK every hour, on Absolute Radio on DAB, smartspeaker, and on the Rayo app.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing

author: Fiona Briggs
title: Rude Health launches Granola flavour – Maple & Pecan – in Waitrose & Ocado
text:
A pioneer in healthy, natural and delicious food and drink, Rude Health, has confirmed the addition of a brand new Granola – Maple & Pecan. The new flavour will be rolling out nationwide with Waitrose across 259 stores from 29th March (RRP: £4 / 400g). The latest launch is also available on Ocado and to the Independents via wholesalers including Infinity and Auguste Noel from next month.
Building on the successes of the rest of the Rude Health cereals range, the Granolas offer a unique and indulgent proposition thanks to the combination of delicious taste, real ingredients and balanced nutrition. Packed with pecans, wholegrains and sunflower seeds and an added drizzle of maple syrup, the new flavour is high in fibre and pairs perfectly with the Rude Health Organic Almond Drink.
In addition to the NPD, the full cereal portfolio also boasts a fresh new look, hitting the shelves from March. In a bid to further drive desirability, the new design uses strong visuals and brighter, bolder graphics, which will create greater stand out on shelf, bringing the Rude Health brand to the front and centre. The iconic ‘lips’ have been made more prominent on pack, to represent both the delicious taste, as well as the Rude Health ‘attitude’. Rolled out at the end of last year with the dairy-free drinks range, the design re-fresh also aims to provide clearer visibility of the nutritional benefits and health claims, making the fixture easier to navigate for consumers.
The Organic Wild Berry Granola recipe has been re-developed to improve clusters, texture and appearance. Now with raspberries, strawberries, blackberries and blueberries, the pack itself has also been updated in colour and copy to drive the deliciousness. As the only organic berry SKU, it has now been voted #1 for overall enjoyment vs the competition.
Founder Camilla Barnard says: “People have loved our granolas ever since we launched The Ultimate Granola – they balance kitchen cupboard ingredients with health and indulgence. So we felt that Maple & Pecan was a no brainer addition to the line up. It’s a flavour people love – in fact it’s the second fastest growing flavour in the wider cereals category! It’s no surprise, given shoppers are looking for more indulgent flavours to enjoy beyond their usual weekday breakfasts. We know they will love this crunchy, nutty granola.
The launch was also the perfect opportunity to refresh our packs. Rude Health is all about deliciousness and we wanted to make this even clearer on our cereals range. The new designs are more consistent with our drinks range and hero the benefits more clearly – they really pop on shelf!”
The full Rude Health range is made using quality ingredients and nothing artificial. All products are non UPF – organic, dairy-free, non GMO, containing no gums and no gunk!

author: Bianca Lucca
title: Morre Ada Carvalho, ex-primeira dama do Maranhão, aos 103 anos
text:
Ada Ferrari de Carvalho morreu, na manhã desta quinta-feira (20/2), de causas naturais, aos 103 anos de idade. Ada, que era ex-primeira dama do Maranhão, esposa do ex-governador José de Matos Carvalho, chegou a Brasília em 1973. Ela tornou-se uma figura ativa na comunidade católica, com dedicação a ações sociais, e frequentadora da Paróquia Nossa Senhora do Perpétuo Socorro (Lago Sul).
O legado de Ada abrange a fé e a dedicação ao próximo. Mãe da paisagista Vânia Carvalho, Ada tem quatro netos, nove bisnetos e uma trineta. Nascida no Rio de Janeiro, Ada passou a juventude no Maranhão, onde conheceu o marido. Em Brasília, José trabalhou como senador e deputado.
Siga o canal do Correio no WhatsApp e receba as principais notícias do dia no seu celular
Ada era conhecida por ser cheia de vida e elegante, mesmo com a idade avançada. Em maio de 2024, a neta Giovanna Adriano casou-se na Igrejinha Nossa Senhora de Fátima, onde Ada entrou carregando as alianças. No mesmo ano, Olívia, a primeira trineta de Ada nasceu, filha da bisneta Carolina Adriano.
A família da falecida lamentou a perda nas redes sociais. “Minha vozinha amada, que Deus te receba de braços abertos”, disse Giovanna. “103 anos de alegria e amor à vida! Descanse em paz”, declarou Fernando, um dos bisnetos.
Detalhes sobre o velório e o sepultamento de Ada ainda não foram divulgados.

author: Igreja do Nazareno África
title: Treinamento em agricultura ajuda a combater a fome e a propagar o evangelho em Madagascar - Church of the Nazarene
text: Treinamento em agricultura ajuda a combater a fome e a propagar o evangelho em Madagascar A região sul de Madagascar vem enfrentando uma seca prolongada, o que leva à escassez de alimentos e à fome. Para combater essa crise, em 2020, os pastores Richard e Therese Ravelomanantsoa forneceram suprimentos essenciais, como alimentos, água e comida para bebês, para o sul afetado pela seca por meio de seu trabalho com o Distrito Madagascar e outros doadores. Em 2022, o foco mudou para capacitar os residentes de Andranovory, na região sudoeste, a cultivar seus vegetais para consumo e venda por meio de um projeto chamado "Agricultura Sustentável Fase 1." Em colaboração com o Helping Hands Africa (um ministério dos Ministérios Nazarenos de Compaixão), a Igreja do Nazareno convidou recentemente um representante de cada uma das 150 famílias da região empobrecida para um treinamento em agricultura sustentável. O objetivo era educar a comunidade sobre o cultivo sustentável de vegetais em um ambiente com escassez de água. Juntamente com o treinamento, os ensinamentos do evangelho foram compartilhados, levando a muitas conversões e pessoas a abraçarem Jesus como seu Salvador e Senhor. Milagrosamente, a chuva caiu pela primeira vez em anos quando a temporada de plantio começou, despertando um novo interesse na agricultura e no crescimento espiritual. A nova abordagem agrícola foi inicialmente recebida com ceticismo por alguns moradores locais, mas testemunhar o sucesso das colheitas de seus vizinhos em um mês fez com que mudassem de ideia. Em outubro de 2022 e março de 2023, sete pessoas da região sul participaram de treinamento teológico em Antananarivo, capacitando-as a estabelecer e liderar igrejas. Quatro voltaram imediatamente para casa para estabelecer igrejas ou pontos de pregação e continuar suas funções de liderança. Os cultos regulares da igreja são realizados em Andranovory, com pontos de pregação adicionais em Antsakoamaro, Ambihivaha e Betaola. Durante uma visita em março de 2024, Richard e Therese foram recebidos por mais de 100 participantes ansiosos debaixo de uma mangueira no ponto de pregação de Antsakoamaro, onde compartilharam o evangelho, resultando em várias conversões. Graças ao apoio contínuo do Helping Hands Africa, as 150 famílias do sul de Madagascar estão agora preparadas para avançar para a segunda fase do Programa de Agricultura Sustentável.

author: El Tribuno
title: Luis Petri, tras el error en la denominación de las Islas Malvinas: \u0026amp;quot;Queremos echar al malnacido\u0026amp;quot;
text: El ministro de Defensa, Luis Petri, anticipó que despedirá al responsable de denominar a las Islas Malvinas como “Falkland” en un comunicado de gobierno, al que calificó de “malnacido”. inicia sesión o regístrate. El ministro de Defensa, Luis Petri, anticipó que despedirá al responsable de denominar a las Islas Malvinas como “Falkland” en un comunicado de gobierno, al que calificó de “malnacido”. “Queremos es echar al responsable, al malnacido que cometió este acto malicioso que no refleja la posición que venimos sosteniendo”, sostuvo en declaraciones radiales. En la misma línea, el funcionario expuso: “Reivindicamos a las héroes de Malvinas, marchan en los desfiles, reivindicamos la soberanía de las islas, estuvimos con 21 ministros de Defensa reivindicando la soberanía de Malvinas”. “Somos claros en nuestra posición, es imprescindible defender la soberanía y estos actos malicioso hay que condenarlos severamente”, insistió al tiempo que calificó de “impropia” el uso de la denominación británica. Asimismo, aclaró: “El problema se generó porque el Ministerio de Defensa no participó de la reunión que es del 16 de junio, pero tiene un altísimo interés para la coordinación de los veteranos de Malvinas”. “Días después, teniendo en cuenta que esto va a permitir la culminación de la tercera etapa para posibilitar la identificación de los caídos en Malvinas, que se interrumpió con el kirchnerismo, la coordinación pide que se suba la nota y ahí si, se habría manipulado la gacetilla original, y se habría cambiado el texto con esta denominación impropia de Malvinas”, remarcó. Por su parte, reveló que avanza en una investigación al interior de la cartera para dar con el responsable y aplicar “las sanciones máximas”. “Instruí la realización de un sumario porque hay una diferencia entre el texto de Cancillería y el que se sube”, contó. Según especificó, también hay diferencia en el contenido del documento enviado desde el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y Culto, pese a que ninguna autoridad de defensa participó de la reunión que se buscaba comunicar. Si bien aún no hay nombre, Petri reveló que en el corto plazo darán con el responsable porque el sistema registra los ingresos a la página web del ministerio. “Se va a saber porque el que lo hizo dejó las huellas pegadas, porque el sistema permite ver quién ingresó. Lo vamos a exonerar”, concluyó.
